input_data.title: Code 404
input_data.overview: In the near future, an undercover Detective Inspector gunned down and killed during a botched sting is brought back via an experimental Artificial Intelligence project. Full of glitches, heâ€™s got to track down the person who shot him, prove himself as a cop so as not to get shut down, and save his marriage and his friendship, all with his partner Carver to boot.

response.analytical_summary: Code 404 is a British sci-fi crime comedy series set in a near-future London where technology has blurred the lines between life and death. The series follows DI John Silas, a detective resurrected as an AI construct after being fatally wounded in the line of duty. Struggling with glitches and a fragmented memory, Silas must solve the mystery of his own death while navigating the complexities of his resurrected existence and maintaining his relationships with his partner, wife, and best friend. The show blends procedural crime elements with darkly comedic moments and explores themes of identity, loss, and the ethical implications of advanced technology.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with DI John Silas being killed during an operation targeting a cybercrime syndicate. Desperate to keep him, his colleagues, led by his best friend and former partner, Dr. Lena Katsuro, utilize an experimental AI project to resurrect him as a digital construct inhabiting a synthetic body. Silas returns to duty partnered with the young and eager Detective Sergeant Gemma Carver, but his resurrection is far from perfect. He experiences glitches, memory lapses, and struggles to reconcile his past life with his new, artificial existence. As Silas investigates his own murder, he uncovers a conspiracy that reaches into the highest levels of the police force. The investigation reveals that Silas was targeted for uncovering corruption within the department, and his resurrection was part of a larger scheme to cover up the truth. Throughout the series, Silas grapples with his identity, questioning whether he is still the man he once was, and struggles to maintain his relationships with his wife, Sophie, and his best friend, Lena, who is both his savior and a source of constant ethical conflict. The series culminates in a confrontation with the individuals responsible for his death, forcing Silas to confront his past and embrace his new reality.
response.keyword_sentence: Code 404 is a darkly comic sci-fi crime series set in near-future London, exploring themes of identity and loss through the story of a detective resurrected as an artificial intelligence construct who must solve his own murder while grappling with technological ethics and police corruption.
